text: Kya Haal, Mr. Paanchal is an Indian television comedy sitcom that airs on Star Bharat. The story is about a mother who demands a perfect daughter-in-law with five qualities from God for her son; however, as a result of a strange twist she ends up with five daughters-in-laws with one quality each. The Paanchal family lives in Meerut. Category:2017 Indian television series debuts
title: Kya Hal Mister Panchal (TV Series)
